changeSet.sql: insert into qc_entry (DTYPE, sequencingObject_id, created_date) select distinct 'FileProcessorErrorQCEntry', p.pair_id, now() from sequence_file_pair_files p INNER JOIN sequence_file s ON s.id=p.files_id where s.file_path like "%.fastq.gz"

insert into qc_entry (DTYPE, sequencingObject_id, created_date) select distinct 'FileProcessorErrorQCEntry', p.id, now() FROM sequence_file_single_end p INNER JOIN sequence_file s ON s.id=p.file_id where s.file_path like "%.fastq.gz";
